Class PluginLoader

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.pluggablecli.PluginLoader
public class PluginLoader extends Object
Discovers and manages CliPlugin instances via ServiceLoader.

Plugins are discovered from the classpath (or a custom ClassLoader) and registered into a CommandRepository. Plugins can be loaded at startup or dynamically at runtime (e.g. after adding JARs to a custom classloader).

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    PluginLoader(CommandRepository repository)
    Creates a loader bound to the given repository.

    • PluginLoader

      public PluginLoader(CommandRepository repository)
      Creates a loader bound to the given repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - the command repository that plugins will register commands into

  • Method Details

    • loadPlugins

      public int loadPlugins()
      Discovers and loads all CliPlugin implementations visible on the thread-context classloader's classpath.
      Returns:
      the number of newly loaded plugins

    • loadPlugins

      public int loadPlugins(ClassLoader classLoader)
      Discovers and loads all CliPlugin implementations visible to the given classloader.
      Parameters:
      classLoader - the classloader to scan for plugin implementations
      Returns:
      the number of newly loaded plugins

    • loadPlugin

      public void loadPlugin(CliPlugin plugin)
      Manually loads a single plugin.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin to load
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a plugin with the same name is already loaded

    • unloadPlugin

      public CliPlugin unloadPlugin(String pluginName)
      Unloads a plugin by name, removing all commands it registered.
      Parameters:
      pluginName - the name of the plugin to unload
      Returns:
      the unloaded plugin, or null if not found

    • getLoadedPlugins

      public Map<String, CliPlugin> getLoadedPlugins()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the currently loaded plugins.
      Returns:
      map of plugin name to plugin instance

    • getPlugin

      public CliPlugin getPlugin(String pluginName)
      Returns the plugin with the given name, or null if not loaded.

    • getPluginCount

      public int getPluginCount()
      Returns the number of currently loaded plugins.
